content:
@nikomatsakis We had talked about using attrs to print out some capture information for the test suite

This is kind of what I had in my mind:

  • https://github.com/sexxi-goose/rust/commit/549ac5061731f13eec409371a37baef27d108a4c
  • and then when min capture is applied we just append to the output https://github.com/sexxi-goose/rust/commit/b2a3bbbfc66734506086ec7bf469db9a71b084e3
